00002 #
00003 #  Implements other numeric functions
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Function::numeric;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::Function);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that the argument is numeric (complex or real)
00011 #
00012 sub _check {(shift)->checkNumeric(@_)}
00013 
00014 #
00015 #  For complex arguments, call the complex version,
00016 #  Otherwise call the version below.
00017 #
00018 sub _eval {
00019   my $self = shift; my $name = $self->{name};
00020   return $_[0]->$name if Value::isComplex($_[0]);
00021   $self->$name(@_);
00022 }
00023 
00024 #
00025 #  Check the arguments and return the (real or complex) result.
00026 #
00027 sub _call {
00028   my $self = shift; my $name = shift;
00029   Value::Error("Function '%s' has too many inputs",$name) if scalar(@_) > 1;
00030   Value::Error("Function '%s' has too few inputs",$name) if scalar(@_) == 0;
00031   my $n = $_[0];
00032   return $self->$name($n) if Value::matchNumber($n);
00033   my $context = (Value::isValue($n) ? $n : $self)->context;
00034   $self->Package("Complex")->promote($context,$n)->$name;
00035 }
00036 
00037 #
00038 #  Should make better errors about division by zero,
00039 #  roots of negatives, logs of negatives.
00040 #
00041 sub ln    {shift; CORE::log($_[0])}
00042 sub log10 {shift; CORE::log($_[0])/CORE::log(10)}
00043 sub exp   {shift; CORE::exp($_[0])}
00044 sub sqrt  {shift; CORE::sqrt($_[0])}
00045 sub abs   {shift; CORE::abs($_[0])}
00046 sub int   {shift; CORE::int($_[0])}
00047 sub sgn   {shift; $_[0] <=> 0}
00048 
00049 sub log   {
00050   my $self = shift; my $context = $self->context;
00051   return CORE::log($_[0])/CORE::log(10) if $context->flag('useBaseTenLog');
00052   CORE::log($_[0]);
00053 }
00054 
00055 #
00056 #  Handle absolute values as a special case
00057 #
00058 sub string {
00059   my $self = shift;
00060   return '|'.$self->{params}[0]->string.'|' if $self->{name} eq 'abs';
00061   return $self->SUPER::string(@_);
00062 }
00063 #
00064 #  Handle absolute values as special case.
00065 #
00066 sub TeX {
00067   my $self = shift; my $def = $self->{def};
00068   return '\left|'.$self->{params}[0]->TeX.'\right|' if $self->{name} eq 'abs';
00069   return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_);
00070 }
00071 #
00072 #  Handle log (and useBaseTenLog) as a special case
00073 #
00074 sub perl {
00075   my $self = shift; my $context = $self->context;
00076   return $self->SUPER::perl
00077     unless $self->{name} eq 'log' && $context->flag('useBaseTenLog');
00078   '(log('.$self->{params}[0]->perl.')/log(10))';
00079 }
